welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fox Crossing! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city and all it has to offer, from our beautiful parks and scenic trails to our delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy every moment of your stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Outagamie County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Outagamie County Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wittman Field Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Wittman Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a comfortable lounge and services for private aircraft owners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Austin-straubel Field Airport provides a variety of services for passengers, including check-in, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Austin-straubel Field Airport offers a range of gates for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Austin-straubel Field Airport primarily serves regional airlines and offers a more compact layout for quicker connections.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
